title: Game Progress Route
content:
in the Realms. You will also find out that Gortash keeps Gondians in prison as collateral to keep the Steel Watch Foundry under control.

I'll make you a deal- take me to the Iron Throne, and I'll protect you from Umberlee's servants. You're going to take me to the Iron Throne- I'm getting the prisoners out. You're as guilty as the people who imprisoned the Gondians. You killed someone. You need to face justice. Leave.

If you choose the 3rd one, then you will now begin the battle against Redha
